thread.section_title: www.sunglassesshop.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of www.sunglassesshop.com | www.sunglassesshop.com
thread.title: s h

author: s h
title: s h
text:
I researched the specific type of Ray Ban sunglasses I needed to replace & found this shop online. I contacted them through customer support to make sure not only were they authentic, but the actual pair I wanted. Support was exceedingly helpful and confirmed my authentication questions.
Just received them (did I mention I'm in the States?!) and they are perfect. And the best price I could find anywhere. I would recommend them wholeheartedly . thanks!
